entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to a few rain showers late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
